name: Recess Shuffle (DennisGXia)
description:
This is the first Multiplayer game that I have worked on! The premise of the game is to complete various challenges on each of the levels and being the first to complete each stage within a lobby awards the player points. The player with the most points at the end of the game will win.

Basic controls include WASD for movement and Space to jump. 



* IF AFTER DOWNLOADING the project and some fonts/text are missing*
The empty space right and under "fill name here" is to create/join lobbies, the button left and under is to join a random room/create a random room. I recommend clicking this one to quick start play with some friends.
